name: CupertinoPageScaffold
desc: Implements a single iOS application page's layout.

fields.name: navigationBar
fields.desc: The [navigationBar], typically a [CupertinoNavigationBar], is drawn at the top of the screen.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: Widget to show in the main content area.

fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.desc: The color of the widget that underlies the entire scaffold.

fields.name: resizeToAvoidBottomInset
fields.desc: Whether the [child] should size itself to avoid the window's bottom inset.
